attributes.action: Family courts refund  all  enforcement  orders  not  adhered of repercussions
attributes.additional_details: Stop unfair  treatment  to  non living parents, limit family  court hearings to  5 hearings.punish none complient parent whom breaches second consecutive  order.Stop alienation, give fathers equal  rights, family  court reform,refund  all monies for breaches of enforcement  orders.Scrape social  and use mediation  services
attributes.background: Make a new  law to stop long racial injustice, inequality , parental alienation, partners  using children  as weapons not being child focus

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, or you might like to sign this petition

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565101
